query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS challenge_registrations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  challengeId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  teamName VARCHAR(200),
  teamMembers JSON,
  status ENUM('registered', 'submitted', 'under_review', 'accepted', 'rejected', 'winner') DEFAULT 'registered',
  registeredAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS challenge_votes (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  submissionId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  voteType ENUM('public', 'judge') DEFAULT 'public',
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS challenge_reviews (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  submissionId INT NOT NULL,
  reviewerId INT NOT NULL,
  criteriaScores JSON,
  overallScore DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
  strengths TEXT,
  weaknesses TEXT,
  recommendations TEXT,
  decision ENUM('shortlist', 'finalist', 'winner', 'reject'),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
